title: Stop autofilling support mains
body:
They are incapable of playing any other role efficiently and cannot compete with dedicated players in their roles. They get jungle and afk farm until all of their lanes die, and have no understanding of jungle pathing whatsoever, they get mid and get completely stomped, they get top, same thing happens.

support mains wont actually admit that playing brand/zyra doesnt work everywhere and that they actually do not know how to properly play any other role in this game.

replies.body: Why? They should have to suffer autofill like anybody else.
This. It wouldn't be fair to exclude Supports. It's either autofill for all or autofill for none.

its fair to exclude supports because every other role can be autofilled and perform well. Supports get autofilled and do not know how to trade/roam/jungle so they pretty much effect the game 5x more in a negative manner
theyre not suffering they type in pre-game chat: "wow im a support main and got mid! :D i luv autofull" then they get curbstomped
So just like when a mid main gets filled to support?
no, support mains enjoy themselves while being destroyed in roles they dont play, while everyone else questions their existence
Don't speak for me. I'm perfectly capable of playing all roles just fine with the exception of jungle. Only thing I can do in jg is a gimmick and if it works good, else I epic fail lol.
yes you are very good at support maximum morde
Hmm, didn't you post this last week?

I'm pretty sure a lot of Support mains play another role because, let's face it, once in a while we want to be the carry and not babysit our ~~suicidal ~~ADC. So far, I've been autofilled once to bot (Q as Mid/Sup or Sup/Mid).

The only one's that seem to have trouble are the Mid/ADC mains who would prefer to troll than learn another role. Support mains at the very least try.
all i see is a salty douche that got the loss he deserved
The same could be said of the mains of all roles.

I misunderstood this rant, but I get it now.  If your so concerned about support mains getting auto-filled into roles they cannot play, then offer to switch it up with the team until everyone has what they can play.   

I would also think that it would be extremely rare someone picking support as primary would get auto-filled.  Not something that would happen very often.
